meanings.definition: Located on the outside or farther from the center.
meanings.sent1: The outer layer of the cake was crispy.
meanings.sent2: She wore her outer jacket to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The outer edges of the puzzle were the hardest to fit together.
meanings.sent4: His outer appearance was calm, but inside he was nervous.
meanings.sent5: The outer walls of the castle were fortified with strong stones.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the external surface or structure.
meanings.sent1: The outer part of the book cover was torn.
meanings.sent2: The outer layer of paint was starting to peel off.
meanings.sent3: The outer design of the building was modern and sleek.
meanings.sent4: Her outer beauty was matched by her inner kindness.
meanings.sent5: The outer shell of the turtle provided protection from predators.
